channel.title: World
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from World, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Swiss ski resort fire: many of injured in life-threatening condition, say officials
item.description: About 40 people died in Crans-Montana bar fire, with investigators saying it could take days to identify all victims Switzerland resort fire – latest ...

item.title: Italian pasta makers win reprieve from Trump tariffs
item.description: US cuts proposed levies to between 2% and 14% despite accusing Italian producers of selling at unfairly low prices The US government has slashed propo...

item.title: Switzerland resort fire live: first victim named, as new video shows attempts to extinguish bar ceiling fire
item.description: More than 100 people still in hospital, many severely injured, after fire in Le Constellation bar in Crans-Montana that killed at least 40 Italy’s amb...

item.title: Weather tracker: Cyclone Hayley brings intense wind and rain to Australia
item.description: Elsewhere, area of low pressure off Iberian peninsula brings lashings of heavy rainfall to southern Portugal and Spain After a recent heatwave affecte...

item.title: Distractions over Abd el-Fattah were running joke, says ex-Starmer adviser
item.description: Paul Ovenden argues time spent discussing political prisoner was symptom of government struggling to focus Efforts to free Alaa Abd el-Fattah regularl...

item.title: Ice and snow around UK in wintry start to 2026
item.description: The worst of the weather is expected to hit Scotland, with weather warnings in place until Sunday.

item.title: FTSE 100 hits 10,000 mark for first time
item.description: A rally on the first trading day of the new year has taken London's main share index through the milestone.

item.title: Trump says he takes higher daily dose of aspirin than doctors recommend
item.description: In an interview about his health, the US president says: "I don't want thick blood pouring through my heart".

item.title: Tiffany Calver on breaking the glass ceiling as she leaves 1Xtra
item.description: Tiffany Calver made headlines when she was announced in 2018 but now she's ready for new challenges.

item.title: Congestion charge for EV drivers comes into effect in London
item.description: Pure battery-powered EVs are no longer eligible for a 100% discount on the congestion charge.
